introduction: The video is based on episodes from my diary. Everything actually happened like that and was transposed in a computer game situation for the video, in which every action is linked to parameters. Movements and emotions and possibilities are reduced to stereotypes, but the text from the off contrasts it with the desire for “real” life, with unpredictability and wonder. (Eva Könnemann)源自：https://www.kasselerdokfest.de/en/screenings/s-f3d9263d-0dae-594d-8032-6a26e84cd7cf
